header_text: You are attending your weekly workout class. While doing the exercises, you start to wonder if you will be able to attend your classes in the future as your HD symptoms worsen. You decide that, over time, your workouts will adapt.

elements.Text: Will you have to quit working out as soon as your symptoms worsen?
